Summary.para: Each item contains information about one activity in the context of one attempt.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: AttemptId is the identifier for the attempt on the package.
ActivityPackageId is the identifier for the activity information that is contained in the package.
CompletionStatus indicates whether or not the activity has been completed.
AttemptCount is a count of the number of sessions this attempt has taken. Every time the attempt is suspended and resumed, this is updated.
DataModelCache is an XML representation of the dynamic data not required for sequencing relating to this activity.
EvaluationPoints is the point value assigned by an instructor as an evaluation of learner responses.
Exit indicates how or why a user left the activity.
LessonStatus indicates the status of the attempt. This value is only used in SCORM 1.2.
Location is the information used by the SCO to determine the learner's position within the SCO, similar in concept to a bookmark.
MinScore is the minimum score allowed.
MaxScore is the maximum score allowed.
ProgressMeasure is the progress toward completing the activity.
RandomPlacement is the order assigned to this activity relative to its siblings. This information is most useful when the cluster is to be randomized.
RawScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner, between MinScore and MaxScore.
ScaledScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner.
SequencingDataCache is an XML representation of the dynamic data required for sequencing relating to this activity.
SessionStartTimestamp is the time (UTC) that the current session started.
SessionTime is the duration of the session as determined by SCO.
SuccessStatus indicates whether the learner has mastered the SCO.
SuspendData is the data saved by SCO when the attempt on the activity is suspended.
TotalTime is the time (in seconds) spent on previous sessions in this attempt on an activity.

Indexes.Index: CREATE INDEX ActivityPackageIndex ON ActivityAttemptItem(ActivityPackageId, AttemptId)

Summary.para: Each item contains information about one local objective of one activity within one e-learning package. Objectives that are added to a package by a SCO via the RTE are not included in this table.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityPackageId is the identifier for the activity related to this objective.
If IsPrimaryObjective is true, this is the primary objective for the related activity.
Key is the identifier from the manifest that identifies this objective. Not necessarily unique.
MinNormalizedMeasure is the minimum measure required to satisfy the measure.
SatisfiedByMeasure is the TODO.
Each item contains information about one activity within one e-learning package.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityIdFromManifest is the identifier for this attempt from the manifest. Guaranteed unique within a package, not unique in the table.
OriginalPlacement is the order assigned to the activity relative to its siblings based on the appearance of the activity in the manifest. The value is zero-based.
ParentActivityId is the identifier of the activity that is a parent of this activity in the activity tree of an organization. If null, this is the root activity being attempted.
PackageId is the identifier of the package associated with this activity.
PrimaryObjectiveId is the identifier of the objective which is identified as the primary objective for this activity.
ResourceId is the identifier of the resource information for this activity.
PrimaryResourceFromManifest is the primary resource to launch for an attempt on this activity.
DataModelCache is an XML representation of the static data relating to this activity.
CompletionThreshold is the completion threshold (as defined in RTE) for this activity.
Credit indicates whether the learner will be credited for completion of the activity.
HideContinue is the flag indicating the UI should not display the 'Continue' button.
HidePrevious is the flag indicating the UI should not display the 'Previous' button.
HideExit is the flag indicating the UI should not display the 'Exit' button.
HideAbandon is the flag indicating the UI should not display the 'Abandon' button.
If IsVisibleInContents is true, the activity is eligible to be visible in the table of contents.
LaunchData is the data provided to start an activity.
MasteryScore is the 'passing' score in SCORM 1.2 content.
MaxAttempts is the maximum number of attempts allowed on this activity.
MaxTimeAllowed is the maximum time allowed for the user to complete a single attempt on the activity.
ResourceParameters is the parameter string used in conjunction with the primary resource for this activity.
ScaledPassingScore is the passing score required to 'pass' the SCO.
TimeLimitAction indicates what a SCO should do when time limit is exceeded.
Title is the title of the activity.

ObjectivesGlobalToSystem is the flag indicating whether the global objectives referenced in this activity tree are global for the learner and the content organization (false) or global for the lifetime of the learner(true).
Each item contains information about progress on one global objective related to one organization.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: LearnerId is the identifier of the learner related to this entry.
GlobalObjectiveId is the identifier for the objective related to this entry.
ScaledScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective.
SuccessStatus indicates whether or not the learner has successfully met this objective.

Each item contains information about one attempt, i.e. one instance of one learner executing one organization of one e-learning package. If the same learner attempts the same organization twice, two AttemptItem rows are created.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC. SLK extends this item type by adding the LearnerAssignmentId property/column and a SQL index.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: LearnerId is the identifier of the learner of this attempt.
RootActivityId is the identifier of the root activity of the package.
CompletionStatus is the TODO.
CurrentActivityId is the identifier of the current active activity.
SuspendedActivityId is the identifier of the previously suspended activity.
PackageId is the identifier of the package that is being attempted.
AttemptStatus is the status of the attempt.
FinishedTimestamp is the date/time (UTC) the attempt was completed or abandoned.
If LogDetailSequencing is true, details of navigation are logged, from the initial activity up to but not including the final destination.
If LogFinalSequencing is true, final destination arrived at when navigating is logged.
If LogRollup is true, rollup operations are logged.
StartedTimestamp is the date/time (UTC) when the attempt was started.
SuccessStatus is the TODO.
TotalPoints is the TODO.
Each item contains information about the learner's progress on one local objective for one activity of one attempt.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityAttemptId is the identifier of the activity related to this attempt.
ActivityObjectiveId is the identifier for the objective related to this entry.
CompletionStatus indicates whether or not the learner has completed work on this objective.
Description is the description of the objective.
If IsPrimaryObjective is true, then this is the primary objective for the related activity.
Key is the identifier for the activity. The identifier is not necessarily unique.
LessonStatus is the SCORM 1.2 compliance field to include status of the current user with respect to this objective.
RawScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, between MinScore and MaxScore.
MinScore is the minimum score allowed on this objective for the learner.
MaxScore is the maximum score allowed on this objective for this learner.
ProgressMeasure is the progress of learner in completing this objective.
ScaledScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective.
SuccessStatus indicates whether or not the learner has successfully met this objective.

Indexes.Index: CREATE INDEX ActivityAttemptIndex ON AttemptObjectiveItem(ActivityAttemptId, ActivityObjectiveId)

Summary.para: Each item contains one comment from the learner related to one activity of one attempt.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityAttemptId is the identifier for the attempt on the activity related to this comment.
Comment is the text of the comment.
Location is the text indicating where the comment applies.
Ordinal is the TODO.
Timestamp is the timestamp (UTC) indicating when the comment was created or most recently changed.
Each item contains a "comments from LMS" string related to a specific activity within an e-learning package. These are read-only by SCOs. SLK does not add rows to the CommentsFromLmsItem table.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityPackageId is the identifier of the activity in a specific package associated with this comment.
Comment is the text of the comment.
Location is the text indicating where the comment applies.
Timestamp is the timestamp (UTC) indicating when comment was created or most recently changed.
Each item contains information about one SCORM correct response string for one InteractionItem. The CorrectResponseItem table contains one row in this table per correct response per interaction.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: InteractionId is the identifier of the interaction for which this is a correct response.
ResponsePattern is the pattern of the correct response.
Each item contains a comment from an evaluator (i.e. an instructor grading a learner assignment) related to one InteractionItem. Only used for e-learning packages in Class Server format.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: InteractionId is the identifier of the interaction for which this is a comment.
Comment is the text of the comment.
Location is the text indicating where the comment applies.
Ordinal is the identifier for the comment that is unique within the interaction.
Timestamp is the timestamp (UTC) indicating when comment was created or most recently changed.
Each item contains one "extension" data model element. An "extension" data model element is a data model element whose name does not begin with "cmi." or "adl.".
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityAttemptId is the identifier of the attempt activity associated with this element.
InteractionId is the TODO.
If this data is related to an objective, AttemptObjectiveId is the related identifier.
Name is the key of the element.
AttachmentGuid is the value of an element represented by a GUID (globally unique identifier).
AttachmentValue is the value of the element represented as an array of bytes.
BoolValue is the value of the element represented as a Boolean.
DateTimeValue is the value of the element represented as a DateTime. The value should be UTC.
DoubleValue is the value of the element represented as a Double.
IntValue is the value of the element stored as an Int32.
StringValue is the value of the element stored as a string.

Indexes.Index: CREATE INDEX ActivityAttemptIndex ON ExtensionDataItem(ActivityAttemptId, AttachmentGuid, InteractionId, AttemptObjectiveId)
CREATE INDEX AttachmentGuidIndex ON ExtensionDataItem(AttachmentGuid, AttemptObjectiveId)
CREATE INDEX InteractionAndObjectiveIndex ON ExtensionDataItem(InteractionId, AttemptObjectiveId)

Summary.para: Each item contains information about one global objective related to one organization of one e-learning package, or one global objective that's not constrained to any one organization of any package.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: OrganizationId is the organization which contains a reference to this objective. If null, the objective applies to entire system.
Key is an identifier for the global objective. If PackageId is null, this is unique within the table, otherwise, it is unique within the package.
Description is the text description of the objective.
Each item contains information about one interaction within one activity of one attempt.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityAttemptId is the identifier for the activity that contains this interaction.
InteractionIdFromCmi is the identifier that is provided by the SCO, through the cmi.interactions.n.id value.
InteractionType is the type of interaction (for example, true-false).
Timestamp is the point in time (UTC) when the interaction was first made available to the learner.
Weighting is the weight given to the interaction. This is commonly used for calculating the score on the activity.
ResultState is an analysis of the result of the interaction; for example, "correct".
ResultNumeric is the numeric value of the interaction result.
Latency is the duration of time between the first interaction and the first response.
Description is a brief description of the interaction.
LearnerResponseBool is the response from the user to a true-false question.
LearnerResponseString is the response from the user to a sequencing, multiple choice or likert question.
LearnerResponseNumeric is the response from the user to a numeric question.
ScaledScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner.
RawScore is the score that reflects the performance of the learner, between MinScore and MinScore.
MinScore is the minimum score allowed.
MaxScore is the maximum score allowed.
EvaluationPoints is the point value assigned to the interaction within the context of the Evaluation.
Each item relates one InteractionItem with one AttemptObjectiveItem.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: InteractionId is the identifier of the interaction for this mapping.
AttemptObjectiveId is the identifier of the AttemptObjectiveItem related to this objective.

Each item contains information about the progress of one learner against a particular global objective, across all activities in all e-learning packages. These objectives may be global to a single package or global to the system -- the data in this table does not distinguish between these two cases.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: LearnerId is the identifier of the learner.
GlobalObjectiveId is the identifier of the objective.
ScaledScore is the measure of result (i.e, a score) for the objective.
SuccessStatus indicates whether the objective has been satisfied.

Indexes.Index: CREATE INDEX LearnerIndex ON LearnerGlobalObjectiveItem(LearnerId, GlobalObjectiveId)

Summary.para: Each item contains a mapping between an ActivityObjectiveItem and a GlobalObjectiveItem.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: ActivityObjectiveId is the identifier for the activity objective being mapped to a global objective.
GlobalObjectiveId is the identifier for the global objective being mapped to a local (activity) objective.

ReadSatisfiedStatus indicates that the satisfaction status for the identified local objective should be retrieved from the identified shared global objective when the progress for this objective is undefined.

ReadNormalizedMeasure is indicates that the normalized measure for the identified local objective should be retrieved from the identified shared global objective when the measure for this objective is undefined.
WriteSatisfiedStatus indicates that the normalized measure for the this objective should be retrieved from the identified shared global objective when the measure for the this objective is undefined.

WriteNormalizedMeasure indicates that the normalized measure for the identified local objective should be transferred to the identified shared global objective upon termination of the attempt on the activity.

Each item contains information about one e-learning package. Before a package can be attempted, a row referring to it must be added to this table. When that happens, detailed information about the package is added to other tables in the schema; for example, information about each activity is added to the ActivityPackageItem table. SLK extends this item type by adding the Warnings property/column.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: PackageFormat is the type of content in the package: SCORM 2004, SCORM 1.2, or Class Server format.
Location is the location of the files within the package. The format of this field is determined by the application.
Manifest is the imsmanifest.xml of the package.
Each item contains information about a rubric that is attached to an interaction.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: InteractionId is the identifier of the interaction that owns this rubric.
Ordinal is the identifier of the rubric. Unique within an interaction.
IsSatisfied indicates if the user has satisfied this rubric.
Points is the point value allowed for this rubric.
Each item contains information about resources used in activities, including the XML of each <resource> element in the package.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: PackageId is the identifier of the package that contains this resource.
ResourceXml is the <resources> node from the package corresponding to these resources.
Each item contains one sequencing log entry, related to one activity of one attempt, or related to an entire attempt. See StoredLearningSession.LoggingOptions.
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: Access is granted to no users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: AttemptId is the identifier for the attempt to which the log entry applies.
ActivityAttemptId is the identifier of the activity that is active after this log entry was created.
EventType is the type of event that caused this entry.
Message is the description that includes why the event happened.
NavigationCommand is the navigation command that caused this event.
Timestamp is the time (UTC) at which the log entry was created.

Each item contains information about one user, including a numeric identifier (UserItemIdentifier) used elsewhere in the database to refer to the user. UserItem items contain a Key property (database column) which, for SLK, contains either the security ID (SID) of the user or the user's login name. (The login name is used for authentication mechanisms such as forms-based authentication which don't use security IDs.)
This LearningStore item type is available in both SLK and MLC. SLK extends this item type by granting access to all users.

Remarks.para: Default operation-level security: In MLC, access is granted to no users. In SLK, query access only is granted to all users.
In MLC, this item type is defined in the namespace Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.BaseSchema, in the assembly Microsoft.LearningComponents.Storage.dll.

Summary.para: Key is a string that uniquely identifies this user. The format of the key is defined by the application. For example, SLK uses a security ID (SID) if available, or a login name for authentication mechanisms (such as forms-based authentication) that don't support SIDs.
Name is the "friendly name" of the learner -- typically first and last name.
AudioCaptioning specifies whether audio captioning is enabled for this user.
AudioLevel is the user's preferred audio listening level.
DeliverySpeed is a scale for how fast content is delivered.
Language is the preferred language of the user.

View.Name: SeqNavOrganizationGlobalObjectiveView
View.Implementation: SELECT GlobalObjectiveItem.OrganizationId OrganizationId, GlobalObjectiveItem.[Key] [Key], PackageGlobalObjectiveItem.LearnerId LearnerId, PackageGlobalObjectiveItem.ScaledScore ScaledScore, PackageGlobalObjectiveItem.SuccessStatus SuccessStatus FROM GlobalObjectiveItem INNER JOIN PackageGlobalObjectiveItem ON PackageGlobalObjectiveItem.GlobalObjectiveId=GlobalObjectiveItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavLearnerGlobalObjectiveView
View.Implementation: SELECT LearnerGlobalObjectiveItem.LearnerId LearnerId, GlobalObjectiveItem.[Key] [Key], LearnerGlobalObjectiveItem.ScaledScore ScaledScore, LearnerGlobalObjectiveItem.SuccessStatus SuccessStatus FROM GlobalObjectiveItem INNER JOIN LearnerGlobalObjectiveItem ON LearnerGlobalObjectiveItem.GlobalObjectiveId=GlobalObjectiveItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavActivityPackageView
View.Implementation: SELECT ActivityPackageItem.Id, ActivityPackageItem.PackageId,PackageItem.PackageFormat PackageFormat, PackageItem.Location PackagePath FROM ActivityPackageItem INNER JOIN PackageItem ON ActivityPackageItem.PackageId=PackageItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavActivityTreeView
View.Implementation: WITH TreeQuery(Id, ParentActivityId, DataModelCache, RootActivityId, ObjectivesGlobalToSystem) AS ( SELECT Id, ParentActivityId, DataModelCache, Id, ObjectivesGlobalToSystem FROM ActivityPackageItem UNION ALL SELECT t1.Id, t1.ParentActivityId, t1.DataModelCache, t2.RootActivityId, t1.ObjectivesGlobalToSystem FROM TreeQuery t2 INNER JOIN ActivityPackageItem t1 ON t1.ParentActivityId=t2.Id ) SELECT Id, ParentActivityId, DataModelCache, RootActivityId, ObjectivesGlobalToSystem FROM TreeQuery

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptView
View.Implementation: SELECT AttemptItem.Id Id, AttemptItem.AttemptStatus, AttemptItem.LogDetailSequencing, AttemptItem.LogFinalSequencing, AttemptItem.LogRollup, AttemptItem.CurrentActivityId, AttemptItem.SuspendedActivityId, AttemptItem.RootActivityId,AttemptItem.StartedTimestamp, AttemptItem.FinishedTimestamp,PackageItem.Id PackageId, PackageItem.PackageFormat PackageFormat, PackageItem.Location PackagePath, UserItem.Id LearnerId, UserItem.Name LearnerName, UserItem.AudioCaptioning LearnerAudioCaptioning, UserItem.AudioLevel LearnerAudioLevel, UserItem.DeliverySpeed LearnerDeliverySpeed, UserItem.Language LearnerLanguage, AttemptItem.TotalPoints, AttemptItem.SuccessStatus, AttemptItem.CompletionStatus FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN PackageItem ON AttemptItem.PackageId=PackageItem.Id INNER JOIN UserItem ON AttemptItem.LearnerId=UserItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavActivityAttemptView
View.Implementation: SELECT ActivityAttemptItem.Id, ActivityAttemptItem.DataModelCache, ActivityAttemptItem.SequencingDataCache, ActivityAttemptItem.RandomPlacement, ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId, ActivityAttemptItem.ActivityPackageId, ActivityPackageItem.DataModelCache StaticDataModelCache, ActivityPackageItem.ParentActivityId ParentId, ActivityPackageItem.ObjectivesGlobalToSystem ObjectivesGlobalToSystem, ActivityAttemptItem.CompletionStatus, ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptCount, ActivityAttemptItem.EvaluationPoints, ActivityAttemptItem.[Exit], ActivityAttemptItem.LessonStatus, ActivityAttemptItem.Location, ActivityAttemptItem.MinScore, ActivityAttemptItem.MaxScore, ActivityAttemptItem.ProgressMeasure, ActivityAttemptItem.RawScore, ActivityAttemptItem.ScaledScore, ActivityAttemptItem.SessionStartTimestamp, ActivityAttemptItem.SessionTime, ActivityAttemptItem.SuccessStatus, ActivityAttemptItem.SuspendData, ActivityAttemptItem.TotalTime FROM ActivityAttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityPackageItem ON ActivityAttemptItem.ActivityPackageId=ActivityPackageItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavCurrentActivityAttemptView
View.Implementation: SELECT ActivityAttemptItem.Id, ActivityAttemptItem.DataModelCache DataModelCache, ActivityAttemptItem.SequencingDataCache, ActivityAttemptItem.RandomPlacement, ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId, ActivityPackageItem.DataModelCache StaticDataModelCache, ActivityPackageItem.ObjectivesGlobalToSystem ObjectivesGlobalToSystem, ActivityPackageItem.Credit Credit FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN ActivityPackageItem ON ActivityAttemptItem.ActivityPackageId=ActivityPackageItem.Id WHERE AttemptItem.CurrentActivityId=ActivityPackageItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavCurrentCommentFromLmsView
View.Implementation: SELECT CommentFromLmsItem.Comment, CommentFromLmsItem.Location, CommentFromLmsItem.Timestamp, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, ActivityAttemptItem.DataModelCache FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN ActivityPackageItem ON ActivityAttemptItem.ActivityPackageId=ActivityPackageItem.Id INNER JOIN CommentFromLmsItem ON ActivityPackageItem.Id=CommentFromLmsItem.ActivityPackageId WHERE AttemptItem.CurrentActivityId=ActivityPackageItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptObjectiveView
View.Implementation: SELECT AttemptObjectiveItem.Id AttemptObjectiveId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, AttemptObjectiveItem.CompletionStatus, AttemptObjectiveItem.Description, AttemptObjectiveItem.[Key], AttemptObjectiveItem.LessonStatus, AttemptObjectiveItem.RawScore, AttemptObjectiveItem.MinScore, AttemptObjectiveItem.MaxScore, AttemptObjectiveItem.ProgressMeasure, AttemptObjectiveItem.ScaledScore, AttemptObjectiveItem.SuccessStatus, AttemptObjectiveItem.ActivityAttemptId, AttemptObjectiveItem.IsPrimaryObjective FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN AttemptObjectiveItem ON AttemptObjectiveItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptCommentFromLearnerView
View.Implementation: SELECT CommentFromLearnerItem.Id CommentFromLearnerId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, CommentFromLearnerItem.Comment, CommentFromLearnerItem.Location, CommentFromLearnerItem.Timestamp, CommentFromLearnerItem.ActivityAttemptId, CommentFromLearnerItem.Ordinal FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN CommentFromLearnerItem ON CommentFromLearnerItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptInteractionView
View.Implementation: SELECT InteractionItem.Id InteractionId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, InteractionItem.InteractionIdFromCmi, InteractionItem.InteractionType, InteractionItem.Timestamp, InteractionItem.Weighting, InteractionItem.ResultState, InteractionItem.ResultNumeric, InteractionItem.Latency, InteractionItem.Description, InteractionItem.LearnerResponseBool, InteractionItem.LearnerResponseString, InteractionItem.LearnerResponseNumeric, InteractionItem.ScaledScore, InteractionItem.RawScore, InteractionItem.MinScore, InteractionItem.MaxScore, InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId, InteractionItem.EvaluationPoints FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN InteractionItem ON InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptEvaluationCommentLearnerView
View.Implementation: SELECT EvaluationCommentItem.Id EvaluationCommentId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, EvaluationCommentItem.Comment, EvaluationCommentItem.Location, EvaluationCommentItem.Timestamp, EvaluationCommentItem.InteractionId, EvaluationCommentItem.Ordinal FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN InteractionItem ON InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id INNER JOIN EvaluationCommentItem ON EvaluationCommentItem.InteractionId=InteractionItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptCorrectResponseView
View.Implementation: SELECT CorrectResponseItem.Id CorrectResponseId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, CorrectResponseItem.InteractionId, CorrectResponseItem.ResponsePattern FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN InteractionItem ON InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id INNER JOIN CorrectResponseItem ON CorrectResponseItem.InteractionId=InteractionItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptInteractionObjectiveView
View.Implementation: SELECT InteractionObjectiveItem.Id InteractionObjectiveId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, InteractionObjectiveItem.AttemptObjectiveId, InteractionObjectiveItem.InteractionId FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN InteractionItem ON InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id INNER JOIN InteractionObjectiveItem ON InteractionObjectiveItem.InteractionId=InteractionItem.Id

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptExtensionDataView
View.Implementation: SELECT ExtensionDataItem.Id ExtensionDataId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, ExtensionDataItem.Name, ExtensionDataItem.StringValue, ExtensionDataItem.IntValue, ExtensionDataItem.BoolValue, ExtensionDataItem.DoubleValue, ExtensionDataItem.DateTimeValue, ExtensionDataItem.AttachmentGuid, ExtensionDataItem.ActivityAttemptId FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN ExtensionDataItem ON ExtensionDataItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id WHERE ExtensionDataItem.AttemptObjectiveId IS NULL AND ExtensionDataItem.InteractionId IS NULL

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptObjectiveExtensionDataView
View.Implementation: SELECT ExtensionDataItem.Id ExtensionDataId, ExtensionDataItem.AttemptObjectiveId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, ExtensionDataItem.Name, ExtensionDataItem.StringValue, ExtensionDataItem.IntValue, ExtensionDataItem.BoolValue, ExtensionDataItem.DoubleValue, ExtensionDataItem.DateTimeValue, ExtensionDataItem.AttachmentGuid, ExtensionDataItem.AttachmentValue FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN AttemptObjectiveItem ON AttemptObjectiveItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id INNER JOIN ExtensionDataItem ON ExtensionDataItem.AttemptObjectiveId=AttemptObjectiveItem.Id WHERE ExtensionDataItem.InteractionId IS NULL AND ExtensionDataItem.AttemptObjectiveId IS NOT NULL

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptInteractionExtensionDataView
View.Implementation: SELECT ExtensionDataItem.Id ExtensionDataId, ExtensionDataItem.InteractionId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, ExtensionDataItem.Name, ExtensionDataItem.StringValue, ExtensionDataItem.IntValue, ExtensionDataItem.BoolValue, ExtensionDataItem.DoubleValue, ExtensionDataItem.DateTimeValue, ExtensionDataItem.AttachmentGuid, ExtensionDataItem.AttachmentValue FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN InteractionItem ON InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id INNER JOIN ExtensionDataItem ON ExtensionDataItem.InteractionId=InteractionItem.Id WHERE ExtensionDataItem.AttemptObjectiveId IS NULL AND ExtensionDataItem.InteractionId IS NOT NULL

View.Name: SeqNavAttemptRubricView
View.Implementation: SELECT RubricItem.Id RubricItemId, AttemptItem.Id AttemptId, RubricItem.InteractionId, RubricItem.Ordinal, RubricItem.IsSatisfied, RubricItem.Points FROM AttemptItem INNER JOIN ActivityAttemptItem ON AttemptItem.Id=ActivityAttemptItem.AttemptId INNER JOIN InteractionItem ON InteractionItem.ActivityAttemptId=ActivityAttemptItem.Id INNER JOIN RubricItem ON RubricItem.InteractionId=InteractionItem.Id
